summary: makes one step in the sun a death sentence for vampires along with a fire death effect while in the sun :)
descriptionHtml:
Update: So i started looking into reduced damage from the sun besides just my instant death but atm im having a problem where the fire effect wears off way before you are killed and health damage stops so it may be a little longer until some other options come but im hoping soon ;)


Info: I started modding skyrim not long ago and each mod i make becomes more and more advanced . At the moment i am working on making vampires much more realistic and deadly . I hope soon to make a vampire overhaul and this is one of the features that will be included but i decided to release this first and get some feedback and ideas and get this mod out to the public . What this mod actually does is changes the sun damage in vampire stages 1,2,3,and 4 to over 20000 for and instant death and adds a fire effect when vampires are killed from sun damage . This mod should work with other vampire mods as long as the sun damage effects are not changed but as i said im going to be making a nice vampire overhaul making vampires much more powerful along with things to keep  them balanced .  

Installation : Simply place the esp into your skyrim data folder and activate it in either the data files section of the skyrim launcher or with the nexus mod manager.  

Please let me know if you have any problems with this mod or any ideas  and also please leave feed back i love to read your comments and know what you think either good or bad . Thanks and enjoy !
